about_the_game:
Take an ounce of building mechanics, add business management, spice it up with interactions with all kinds of customers. It’s the recipe for Restaurant Simulator, a first-person game where you build your own restaurant from the ground up!

From the publisher of the massive indie hit Gas Station Simulator.

START SMALL, GO BIG



Taste the life of a restaurant owner and go all the way from rags to riches. Create the look and feel of your place, design the menu and deal with the customers. Serve them, cook, pick up the trash and clean the dishes. Decorate, arrange, manage, and see your business grow.

SERIOUS GOURMET EXPERIENCE



Be the boss and make all the decisions. From the color of tablecloths to the dishes in your menu. From the wallpapers to the uniforms of your staff. If the soup is salty, so are your guests, so ensure the quality of both food and service.

NEVER TOO MANY COOKS



As your place gets more and more popular, you will expand it with a new interior layout, fancy dishes, and staff to assist you. Hire cooks, waiters and cleaners. Oversee them, and step in if they can’t handle a Karen. You decide if the customer is always right!

Features

  • First-person restaurant simulator with tons of customization options.
  • Arrange and decorate the interiors to your liking.
  • Easy to learn but hard to master resource management.
  • Engaging cooking mechanics with many different recipes.
  • Interactive NPCs with different personalities and quirks.
  • Beautiful realistic visuals and sounds.

name: Restaurant Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,40GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 / AMD RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: An immersive first-person sim that lets you taste the life of a restaurant owner. Be a chef, a waiter, an interior decorator. Open your own place and make it #1 in the town!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
